description: Hummingbird's Mint (Agastache 'Violet Vision') is an amazing plant for attracting hummingbirds and bees, as well as adding a burst of color to any garden. It loves full sun and can easily reach heights up to three feet, providing stunning flower spikes of violet-colored blooms from summer to fall. The plant is also drought tolerant and low maintenance with fragrant foliage that can be used for pickling. What's more, the leaves and stems are edible and make for tasty teas or infused vinegars. Quick to establish and enjoyably attractive, Hummingbird's Mint is one plant that will bring a unique touch to any landscape.
